generated.css: @import (max-width:767px){.logo{width:180px}}.unencryptArea{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;width:28%;height:800px;flex-shrink:0;border-radius:32px;background-color:#fff;padding:24px;margin:12px;overflow:auto;text-wrap:wrap;box-shadow:0 4px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){.unencryptArea{width:70%;height:472px}.unencryptArea h2{font-size:20px;padding:0;margin:0}.unencryptArea .p{font-size:24px;color:#0a3871}.unencryptButton{background-color:#d8dfe8;color:#052051}.copyButton,.encryptButton{background-color:#052051;color:#fff}.copyButton{position:absolute;bottom:40px}@media
